mapper.select:
select BOD_NO,TITLE,CRE_DT,VW_CNT,CONTS from board where type=0 order by BOD_NO desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
select A.BOD_NO, A.WRITER, A.EMAIL, A.TITLE, A.CRE_DT, A.VW_CNT, A.CONTS, A.TYPE, B.PHO_PATH from BOARD A INNER JOIN BOD_PHO B on A.BOD_NO = B.BOD_NO where A.BOD_NO = #{boardNo} and A.TYPE = 0
mapper.insert: insert into board(EMAIL, TYPE, TITLE, CONTS, VW_CNT, CRE_DT, WRITER) values(#{email}, 0, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set TITLE=#{title}, CONTS=#{contents} where BOD_NO=#{boardNo} and type=0
mapper.delete: delete from board where BOD_NO=#{boardNo} and type=0
